description:
Work to various trees in Osterley Gardens West Park Road  and Osterley Views Chevy Road (applicant's T numbers in brackets); 
 
 TPO 117
 T13 London Plane (T662) - Reduce crown by 25%(by 3-4m)
 T14 Horse Chestnut (T663) - Reduce crown by 25% (3-4m)
 T12 Deodar Cedar (T665) - Fell and grind stump
 T9 Cypress (T671) - Reduce taller upright stems by 2m
 T30 False Acacia (T676) - Fell and grind stump
 T16 False Acacia (T680) - Fell and grind stump
 T94 Norway Maple (T686) - Balance crown by reducing the length of branches towards the car park by about 2m. Remove the weaker of each pair of crossing branches.
 T93 Horse Chestnut (T688) - Reduce crown by 25% (3-4m)
 T104 Lime (T704) - Reduce crown by 25% (by 2-3m)
  
 TPO 562
 T1 London Plane (T692) - Remove deadwood
 
 Work agreed for trees not protected by TPO (applicant's T numbers)
 T661 Cherry - Remove stake, maintain 3m clearance over paths and 5m over roadways
 T664 Cherry x 2 - Crown lift to 2.5m by removing secondary branches
 T669 Crab Apple - Formative pruning
 next to T676 Box Elder - Remove stake and tie
 T677 Norway Maple - Remove basal, green leafed shoots. Shorten two lowest branches progressively
 T678 False Acacia - Crown lift and thin
 T682 Cherry - Remove adjacent Sycamore, remove basal shoots
 T684 Cypress x 3 - Reduce by 3m
 T685 False Acacia - pruning as appropriate
 T689 False Acacia - Remove at a fork that part of the crown that extends across the footpath
 T698 Cherry - Remove stake
 T699 Box Elder - Reduce to previous reduction points(by2m)
